tasks.title: Send proposal to Jane Doe
tasks.description: Prepare and send the pricing proposal to Jane Doe at Acme Corp based on the discussed requirements.

tasks.title: Schedule demo for Acme Corp
tasks.description: Set up a personalized demo session for Jane Doe covering the features discussed.

tasks.title: Follow-up call with Jane Doe
tasks.description: Reach out to Jane Doe to continue the conversation and address any remaining questions.

tasks.title: Share technical documentation with Jane Doe
tasks.description: Send relevant technical docs, API references, or integration guides to Jane Doe at Acme Corp.

tasks.title: Internal sync on Acme Corp deal
tasks.description: Align with internal team (engineering/product) on Acme Corp requirements and feasibility.

tasks.title: Send recap email to Jane Doe
tasks.description: Send a thank-you and recap email to Jane Doe summarizing key points and agreed next steps.
